reviews.text: This is a fantastic beer.  You wonât find it in cans or bottles (yet!) but drink some direct from the brewery and you wonât find a more agreeable ale - also have your beer-hating girlfriend try some and watch her like it!
Lots of melon from the new Hull hops. Some spice from yeast. Extremely drinkable. In cans and on tap, very sessionable.

I FREQUENTLY HAVE TO ASK MYSELF,  IS THIS A GREAT BEER??, OR THE GREATEST BEER?? IâM LEANING TOWARDS GREATEST. VERY AFFORDABLE AND EASY TO FIND IN STORES. PERFECT FOR ANY OCCASION AND ALL AGE GROUPS.
